languages.text: "О скорбный, скорбный день! Мы провожаем в последний путь душу общества Футфола, верного слугу {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, мецената, не жалевшего средств на поддержание огня веры, пример для подражания всем грядущим поколениям — благороднейшего, незабываемого господина Беллардо! Эта утрата..." {n}Суетливый клерк {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g} говорит с надрывом — и незаметно поглядывает на бумагу с текстом. Речь его длится и длится, сливаясь в монотонный поток восхвалений покойного господина Беллардо.{/n}

"Oh, what a terrible, sorrowful day! We pay our respects to the life and soul of Footfall society, a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, a generous benefactor who spared no expense to keep the fire of faith burning, and an example to all future generations — the most noble and unforgettable Master Bellardo! This loss..." {n}The fussy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk speaks in a strained voice — and keeps peeking at a paper with text on it. His speech drags on and on, blending into a monotonous cascade of praises of the late Master Bellardo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "О скорбный, скорбный день! Мы провожаем в последний путь душу общества Футфола, верного слугу {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, мецената, не жалевшего средств на поддержание огня веры, пример для подражания всем грядущим поколениям — благороднейшего, незабываемого господина Беллардо! Эта утрата..." {n}Суетливый клерк {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g} говорит с надрывом — и незаметно поглядывает на бумагу с текстом. Речь его длится и длится, сливаясь в монотонный поток восхвалений покойного господина Беллардо.{/n}

We pay our respects to the life and soul of the Footfall society, loyal servant of the Imperium, generous benefactor who spared no expense to support the fire of faith, example to all future generations — the noblest and unforgettable Master Bellardo! This loss..." {n}The fussy Administratum clerk speaks in a strained voice — and keeps peeking at a paper with text on it. His speech drags on and on, blending into a monotonous cascade of praises of the late Master Bellardo.{/n}

languages.text: “噢，多么晦暗，多么令人哀恸的日子啊！让我们对落脚港的住民、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的忠实仆人、不遗余力延续信仰之火的慷慨布施者、我们所有子孙后代的榜样——最崇高、最伟大的贝拉多大师，致以最深切的敬意！他的离世……”{n}这位来自{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}的文员用紧张的声音说着，还不断地瞥着一张写满了字的纸。他的演说冗长而拖拉，以单调的声音赞颂着已故的贝拉多大师。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, what a terrible, sorrowful day! We pay our respects to the life and soul of Footfall society, a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, a generous benefactor who spared no expense to keep the fire of faith burning, and an example to all future generations — the most noble and unforgettable Master Bellardo! This loss..." {n}The fussy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk speaks in a strained voice — and keeps peeking at a paper with text on it. His speech drags on and on, blending into a monotonous cascade of praises of the late Master Bellardo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “噢，多么晦暗，多么令人哀恸的日子啊！让我们对落脚港的住民、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的忠实仆人、不遗余力延续信仰之火的慷慨布施者、我们所有子孙后代的榜样——最崇高、最伟大的贝拉多大师，致以最深切的敬意！他的离世……”{n}这位来自{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}的文员用紧张的声音说着，还不断地瞥着一张写满了字的纸。他的演说冗长而拖拉，以单调的声音赞颂着已故的贝拉多大师。{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: «¡Oh, qué día tan aciago! Hoy presentamos nuestros respetos al corazón y el alma de la sociedad de Paso, un sirviente leal del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, un generoso benefactor que no reparaba en gastos para mantener ardiendo la llama de la fe y un ejemplo a seguir para las nuevas generaciones: ¡el nobilísimo e inolvidable maestro Bellardo! Esta pérdida...». {n}El meticuloso representante del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} habla en tono forzado y no deja de ojear un papel con texto escrito. Su discurso se hace eterno en una cascada monótona de alabanzas al fallecido maestro Bellardo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, what a terrible, sorrowful day! We pay our respects to the life and soul of Footfall society, a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, a generous benefactor who spared no expense to keep the fire of faith burning, and an example to all future generations — the most noble and unforgettable Master Bellardo! This loss..." {n}The fussy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk speaks in a strained voice — and keeps peeking at a paper with text on it. His speech drags on and on, blending into a monotonous cascade of praises of the late Master Bellardo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, qué día tan aciago! Hoy presentamos nuestros respetos al corazón y el alma de la sociedad de Paso, un sirviente leal del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, un generoso benefactor que no reparaba en gastos para mantener ardiendo la llama de la fe y un ejemplo a seguir para las nuevas generaciones: ¡el nobilísimo e inolvidable maestro Bellardo! Esta pérdida...». {n}El meticuloso representante del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} habla en tono forzado y no deja de ojear un papel con texto escrito. Su discurso se hace eterno en una cascada monótona de alabanzas al fallecido maestro Bellardo.{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: 「なんて恐ろしく悲しい日なのだろう！{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の忠実な従者であり、信仰の炎を燃やし続けるためにあらゆる犠牲を惜しまなかった寛大な恩人、そしてすべての後世の模範である最高に高貴で忘れがたい、フットフォールの命と魂であるマスター、最も高貴で忘れがたいマスター・ベラルドに敬意を表します！この損失は…」{n}気難しそうな{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国{/g}の職員が、何かが書かれた紙に目をやりながら緊張した声で話をする。彼の話は延々と続き、故マスター・ベラルドを讃える単調な演説へと変化していった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, what a terrible, sorrowful day! We pay our respects to the life and soul of Footfall society, a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, a generous benefactor who spared no expense to keep the fire of faith burning, and an example to all future generations — the most noble and unforgettable Master Bellardo! This loss..." {n}The fussy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk speaks in a strained voice — and keeps peeking at a paper with text on it. His speech drags on and on, blending into a monotonous cascade of praises of the late Master Bellardo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なんて恐ろしく悲しい日なのだろう！{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の忠実な従者であり、信仰の炎を燃やし続けるためにあらゆる犠牲を惜しまなかった寛大な恩人、そしてすべての後世の模範である最高に高貴で忘れがたい、フットフォールの命と魂であるマスター、最も高貴で忘れがたいマスター・ベラルドに敬意を表します！この損失は…」{n}気難しそうな{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国{/g}の職員が、何かが書かれた紙に目をやりながら緊張した声で話をする。彼の話は延々と続き、故マスター・ベラルドを讃える単調な演説へと変化していった。{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: "Oh, was für ein furchtbarer, trauriger Tag! Wir erweisen dem Leben und der Seele der Gesellschaft von Footfall unseren Respekt, einem treuen Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}, einem großzügigen Gönner, der keine Kosten scheute, um das Feuer des Glaubens zu schüren, und ein Vorbild für alle künftigen Generationen – dem edlen und unvergesslichen Meister Bellardo! Dieser Verlust ..." {n}Die Stimme des geschäftigen {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}-Angestellten klingt bemüht – und er blickt immer wieder auf einen Zettel mit Text darauf. Seine Ansprache nimmt kein Ende und wird zu einer monotonen Abfolge von Lobpreisungen des verstorbenen Meister Bellardo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, what a terrible, sorrowful day! We pay our respects to the life and soul of Footfall society, a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, a generous benefactor who spared no expense to keep the fire of faith burning, and an example to all future generations — the most noble and unforgettable Master Bellardo! This loss..." {n}The fussy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk speaks in a strained voice — and keeps peeking at a paper with text on it. His speech drags on and on, blending into a monotonous cascade of praises of the late Master Bellardo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Oh, was für ein furchtbarer, trauriger Tag! Wir erweisen dem Leben und der Seele der Gesellschaft von Footfall unseren Respekt, einem treuen Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}, einem großzügigen Gönner, der keine Kosten scheute, um das Feuer des Glaubens zu schüren, und ein Vorbild für alle künftigen Generationen – dem edlen und unvergesslichen Meister Bellardo! Dieser Verlust ..." {n}Die Stimme des geschäftigen {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}-Angestellten klingt bemüht – und er blickt immer wieder auf einen Zettel mit Text darauf. Seine Ansprache nimmt kein Ende und wird zu einer monotonen Abfolge von Lobpreisungen des verstorbenen Meister Bellardo.{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: « Oh, quelle funeste journée ! Toutes nos pensées accompagnent maître Bellardo, une âme aussi noble qu'illustre, pilier central de la société de Castel, fidèle serviteur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, généreux bienfaiteur qui n'a jamais regardé à la dépense pour attiser le feu de la foi, un exemple pour toutes les générations à venir ! Une telle perte... » {n}Le greffier agité de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} parle d'une voix cassée tout en consultant régulièrement une feuille de papier. Son discours, banal éloge de feu maître Bellardo, se poursuit dans la même veine pendant ce qui semble être une éternité.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, what a terrible, sorrowful day! We pay our respects to the life and soul of Footfall society, a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, a generous benefactor who spared no expense to keep the fire of faith burning, and an example to all future generations — the most noble and unforgettable Master Bellardo! This loss..." {n}The fussy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk speaks in a strained voice — and keeps peeking at a paper with text on it. His speech drags on and on, blending into a monotonous cascade of praises of the late Master Bellardo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oh, quelle funeste journée ! Toutes nos pensées accompagnent maître Bellardo, une âme aussi noble qu'illustre, pilier central de la société de Castel, fidèle serviteur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, généreux bienfaiteur qui n'a jamais regardé à la dépense pour attiser le feu de la foi, un exemple pour toutes les générations à venir ! Une telle perte... » {n}Le greffier agité de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} parle d'une voix cassée tout en consultant régulièrement une feuille de papier. Son discours, banal éloge de feu maître Bellardo, se poursuit dans la même veine pendant ce qui semble être une éternité.{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: "Ne kara, ne elim bir gün! Binliman sosyetesinin eşsiz mensubu, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} sadık hizmetkârı, inanç ateşinin sönmesini engellemek için hiçbir masraftan kaçınmayan cömert hayırsever ve gelecek nesillere örnek teşkil eden insana... Soylu ve unutulmaz Üstat Bellardo'ya saygılarımızı sunuyoruz! Büyük kaybımız..." {n}Gergin {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} kâtibi, âdeta duygu patlamasıyla konuşuyor ve üzerinde bir şeyler yazan kâğıda bakıp duruyor. Konuşması uzadıkça uzuyor ve merhum Üstat Bellardo'ya övgüler dizen sıkıcı bir tirada dönüşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, what a terrible, sorrowful day! We pay our respects to the life and soul of Footfall society, a loyal servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, a generous benefactor who spared no expense to keep the fire of faith burning, and an example to all future generations — the most noble and unforgettable Master Bellardo! This loss..." {n}The fussy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk speaks in a strained voice — and keeps peeking at a paper with text on it. His speech drags on and on, blending into a monotonous cascade of praises of the late Master Bellardo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ne kara, ne kederli bir gün! Binliman sosyetesinin eşsiz üyesi, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un sadık hizmetkârı, inanç ateşinin sönmesini engellemek için hiçbir masraftan kaçınmayan cömert hayırseveri ve gelecek nesillere örnek teşkil eden o insana, soylu ve unutulmaz Üstat Bellardo'ya saygılarımızı sunuyoruz! Büyük kaybımız..." {n}Müşkülpesent {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} kâtibi, yapmacık bir tavırla konuşuyor ve üzerinde bir şeyler yazan kâğıda bakıp duruyor. Konuşması bitmek bilmiyor, rahmetli Üstat Bellardo'ya yağdırdığı övgüler boğucu bir sele dönüşüp üzerimize akıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1
